plot: Will returns to Hong Kong to direct a play. However, his cast begins to question him on the conflict between the father and son within the story. He must come to terms with his relationship...
title: Line by Line
plot_es: Will returns to Hong Kong to direct a play. However, his cast begins to question him on the conflict between the father and son within the story. He must come to terms with his relationship...
plot_en: Will returns to Hong Kong to direct a play. However, his cast begins to question him on the conflict between the father and son within the story. He must come to terms with his relationship...
